About NOVA Build Pros

General contractors can make a big difference in the appearance and functionality of your residence or commercial property, but it's important to select the right crew. With references available upon request and a fully licensed, bonded, and insured workforce, NOVA Build Pros deserves your consideration whenever you're contemplating a project.


We have more than a decade of experience, which enables us to complete all kinds of construction and building tasks. We're adept at planning projects to keep costs under control and avoid preventable delays. We'll work hard to fulfill your objectives as speedily as possible while delivering an exceptional outcome.


NOVA Build Pros is a service-disabled veteran-owned small business with over 20 years of experience in building and general contracting. We are a partnership of the most talented and trustworthy building professionals brought together to deliver the kind of world-class service that keeps our customers coming back. We are a licensed and insured, class A contracting company certified to perform home and commercial improvements, building, HVAC, electrical, plumbing and gas fitting. NOVA Build Pros' leadership team brings a wide range of engineering, building, business, and project management professional experience to guide your project to completion with minimal disruption to your home.


The concept that drives NOVA Build Pros is simple. Customer service is the cornerstone of that concept. We are you. We've also been frustrated by contractors who repeatedly fail to deliver their promised service, contractors that you can only contact through voicemail after multiple attempts, contractors who don't show up when promised, and contractors who don't treat your home like you treat your home. We aren't perfect, but that's a goal we are working hard to achieve. Your feedback is highly valued and is how we measure our performance. Keep it coming!


When considering your next home or commercial addition, deck, fence, kitchen, patio, gazebo, siding, window, door, or roofing project, give the Pros a call and discover Northern Virginia's Best!


Let us design and build your next home or commercial improvement project. Tell us what you have in mind. We will bring it to life. Whether your need an enclosed patio to extend your living space and protect from fall insects, a wrap around second-floor deck, or a patio with gazebo and outdoor kitchen. We are your project consultant. Alternatively, if you're just not sure what you'd like, tell us what the desired outcome of your project is (eg. more living space, open concept living, more natural light...) and let us advise you on possible solutions.!


When it's time to break ground, we will closely manage your project from permit application to sign-off and each step in between. With an engineer, project management professional, and professional builder on staff, NOVA Build Pros is positioned to answer your most pressing questions and offer practical advice to help you achieve the desired outcome of your project. We also have Quality Construction Management certified staff personnel to ensure we are safely meeting or exceeding your expectations during every phase of the project.


We specialize in providing solutions to your most complex problems. Of course, we will 'WOW' you with our world class decks, fences, walls, additions, kitchens, patios, roofing, doors and windows. But we don't stop there. Just tell us what you need and we will help you find a solution. If we can't, we will recommend someone who can

ABOUT NOVA Build Pros

Nova Build Pros delivers superior customer service to all of Northern Virginia. Our team of professionals has over 20 years of experience.
We are a Class A General Contractor offering remodeling services,roofing, siding, HVAC, electrical, and plumbing.
